TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TrackBarThumbState extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the visual state of a track bar slider (also known as a thumb) that is drawn with visual styles.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The TrackBarThumbState values correspond to the states of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> objects exposed by the following classes:
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TrackBar.Thumb>
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TrackBar.ThumbBottom>
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TrackBar.ThumbLeft>
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TrackBar.ThumbRight>
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TrackBar.ThumbTop>
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TrackBar.ThumbVertical>
The TrackBarThumbState values are also used as an argument in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarRenderer?displayProperty=fullName> class methods that draw the track bar slider.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TrackBarThumbState Disabled = int32(5)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TrackBarThumbState Hot = int32(2)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TrackBarThumbState Normal = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TrackBarThumbState Pressed = int32(3)
